title: Sri Lanka President set up economic committee
body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s President Gotabaya Rajapaksa has set up an economic committee chaired by himself with key ministers and secretaries to formulate economic policies and implement them, Information Minister Dallas Alahapperuma said.

The committee will have Prime Minister Mahinda Rajapaksa, Finance Minister Basil Rajapaksa, Trade Minister Bandula Gunewardene, Highways Minister Johnston Fernando, Agriculture Minister Mahindanda Aluthgamage and Plantations Minister Ramesh Pathirana.
Central Bank Governor Nivard Cabraal, President’s Secretary Gamini Senarath, Treasury Secretary S R Attrygalle and Deputy Central Bank Governor Dammika Nanayakkara.
The committee will discuss economic policies, speed up ongoing projects  and implement decisions with cabinet approval. (Colombo/Mar09/2022)
